summary: This simple mod adds a NPC to the Arcanaeum who sells the Master spells and other spells.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Leveling Destruction, Illusion, Conjuration, Alteration and Restoration to 100 just to unlock the Master level spells takes way too long so you end up not using them for the most part of your play-through, this mod changes that. It adds a new NPC to theÂ Arcanaeum who sells the Master level spells and some other leveled spells. He behaves like any other vendor except he is willing to sell/buy stuff 24/7 (unlike the usual 8am to 20pm). The spells are quite expensive (4000 gold or more).

This mod DOESN'T change the Ritual quests so you can still do them when you reach 100 if you wish to.
The vendor can probably sell spells from other mods as long as they are in the leveled list.[/size]
author: spinerex
